Modele

Class Tas

  • java.lang.Object
    • Modele.Observable
      • Modele.Tas
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Jest, Main, Pioche, Trophee

    public class Tas
extends Observable
    This class is the superclass for all collections of cards, it contains a list of cards and is observable.
    Author:
    dinh_, tran_
    See Also:
    Observable
